casebody.data:
James J. THOLE, et al., petitioners,
v.
U.S. BANK, N.A., et al. No. 17-1712. Supreme Court of the United States June 28, 2019.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit granted. In addition to the questions presented by the petition, the parties are directed to brief and argue the following question: Whether petitioners have demonstrated Article III standing.
